name: Memories (itch) (Raul M)
description:
Psychological Horror Game with Psychology of Memories!

Game story: A psychologically disturbed person has to find a way out of the darkness and you will show him the way to collect business cards and find the key to the game! But before you finish, you have to take the medicine of a man with a psychological defect! If you can't find the medicine, you can be a man! Remember, you are playing that person's dream!

Controls:
Move: W, A, S, D, mouse

Mouse Left Click: Open the Door, Open

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows 7. 8. 8.1, 10

Processor: Dual layer Intel i3 CPU @ 2GHz +

Memory: 2 GB RAM

Screen card: Intel 3xxx series, 1.5 GB VRAM or better

Hard disk: We will be able to use 500 MB of space

Raul Medetov (C)2020
